amendment.description: Amendment strikes language precluding Federal court jurisdiction over claims dealing with the interference in interstate commerce and antitrust.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House report 106-498 to eliminate a provision in the bill that bars federal court jurisdiction over claims relating to interference with interstate commerce and antitrust.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
